verses.english: By the rivers of Babylon, there we sat down, yea, we wept, when we remembered Zion.

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

strongs_def: a stream (including the sea; expectation the Nile, Euphrates, etc.); figuratively, prosperity
gloss: flood, river.

strongs_def: Babel (i.e. Babylon), including Babylonia and the Babylonian empire
gloss: Babel, Babylon.

derivation: a primitive particle (rather from the relative pronoun, H834 (אֲשֶׁר));
strongs_def: there (transferring to time) then; often thither, or thence
gloss: in it, [phrase] thence, there (-in, [phrase] of, [phrase] out), [phrase] thither, [phrase] whither.

strongs_def: properly, to sit down (specifically as judge. in ambush, in quiet); by implication, to dwell, to remain; causatively, to settle, to marry
gloss: (make to) abide(-ing), continue, (cause to, make to) dwell(-ing), ease self, endure, establish, [idiom] fail, habitation, haunt, (make to) inhabit(-ant), make to keep (house), lurking, [idiom] marry(-ing), (bring again to) place, remain, return, seat, set(-tle), (down-) sit(-down, still, -ting down, -ting (place) -uate), take, tarry.

derivation: by contraction from an unused root meaning to gather;
strongs_def: properly, assemblage; used only adverbially also, even, yea, though; often repeated as correl. both...and
gloss: again, alike, also, (so much) as (soon), both (so)...and, but, either...or, even, for all, (in) likewise (manner), moreover, nay...neither, one, then(-refore), though, what, with, yea.

strongs_def: to weep; generally to bemoan
gloss: [idiom] at all, bewail, complain, make lamentation, [idiom] more, mourn, [idiom] sore, [idiom] with tears, weep.

derivation: a primitive root; also as denominative from H2145 (זָכָר)
strongs_def: properly, to mark (so as to be recognized), i.e. to remember; by implication, to mention;  to be male
gloss: [idiom] burn (incense), [idiom] earnestly, be male, (make) mention (of), be mindful, recount, record(-er), remember, make to be remembered, bring (call, come, keep, put) to (in) remembrance, [idiom] still, think on, [idiom] well.

derivation: apparent contracted from H226 (אוֹת) in the demonstrative sense of entity;
strongs_def: properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
gloss: (as such unrepresented in English).

derivation: the same (regularly) as H6725 (צִיּוּן)lemma צִיוּן missing dagesh, corrected to צִיּוּן;
strongs_def: Tsijon (as a permanent capital), a mountain of Jerusalem
gloss: Zion.

verses.english: We hanged our harps upon the willows in the midst thereof.

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

strongs_def: a willow (from the use of osiers as wattles)
gloss: willow.

derivation: from an unused root meaning to sever;
strongs_def: a bisection, i.e. (by implication) the centre
gloss: among(-st), [idiom] between, half, [idiom] (there-, where-), in(-to), middle, mid(-night), midst (among), [idiom] out (of), [idiom] through, [idiom] with(-in).

strongs_def: to suspend (especially to gibbet)
gloss: hang (up).

derivation: from a unused root meaning to twang;
strongs_def: a harp
gloss: harp.

verses.english: For there they that carried us away captive required of us a song; and they that wasted us required of us mirth, saying, Sing us one of the songs of Zion.

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

derivation: a primitive particle (rather from the relative pronoun, H834 (אֲשֶׁר));
strongs_def: there (transferring to time) then; often thither, or thence
gloss: in it, [phrase] thence, there (-in, [phrase] of, [phrase] out), [phrase] thither, [phrase] whither.

strongs_def: to inquire; by implication, to request; by extension, to demand
gloss: ask (counsel, on), beg, borrow, lay to charge, consult, demand, desire, [idiom] earnestly, enquire, [phrase] greet, obtain leave, lend, pray, request, require, [phrase] salute, [idiom] straitly, [idiom] surely, wish.

strongs_def: to transport into captivity
gloss: (bring away, carry, carry away, lead, lead away, take) captive(-s), drive (take) away.

strongs_def: a word; by implication, a matter (as spoken of) or thing; adverbially, a cause
gloss: act, advice, affair, answer, [idiom] any such (thing), because of, book, business, care, case, cause, certain rate, [phrase] chronicles, commandment, [idiom] commune(-ication), [phrase] concern(-ing), [phrase] confer, counsel, [phrase] dearth, decree, deed, [idiom] disease, due, duty, effect, [phrase] eloquent, errand, (evil favoured-) ness, [phrase] glory, [phrase] harm, hurt, [phrase] iniquity, [phrase] judgment, language, [phrase] lying, manner, matter, message, (no) thing, oracle, [idiom] ought, [idiom] parts, [phrase] pertaining, [phrase] please, portion, [phrase] power, promise, provision, purpose, question, rate, reason, report, request, [idiom] (as hast) said, sake, saying, sentence, [phrase] sign, [phrase] so, some (uncleanness), somewhat to say, [phrase] song, speech, [idiom] spoken, talk, task, [phrase] that, [idiom] there done, thing (concerning), thought, [phrase] thus, tidings, what(-soever), [phrase] wherewith, which, word, work.

strongs_def: a song; abstractly, singing
gloss: musical(-ick), [idiom] sing(-er, -ing), song.

strongs_def: causing to howl, i.e. an oppressor
gloss: that wasted.

strongs_def: blithesomeness or glee, (religious or festival)
gloss: [idiom] exceeding(-ly), gladness, joy(-fulness), mirth, pleasure, rejoice(-ing).

derivation: or (the original form) שׁוּר; (1 Samuel 18:6), a primitive root (rather identical with H7788 (שׁוּר) through the idea of strolling minstrelsy);
strongs_def: to sing
gloss: behold (by mistake for H7789 (שׁוּר)), sing(-er, -ing man, -ing woman).

strongs_def: a song; abstractly, singing
gloss: musical(-ick), [idiom] sing(-er, -ing), song.

derivation: the same (regularly) as H6725 (צִיּוּן)lemma צִיוּן missing dagesh, corrected to צִיּוּן;
strongs_def: Tsijon (as a permanent capital), a mountain of Jerusalem
gloss: Zion.

verses.english: How shall we sing the LORD's song in a strange land?

derivation: also אֵיכָה ; and אֵיכָכָה ; prolonged from H335 (אַי);
strongs_def: how? or how!; also where
gloss: how, what.

derivation: or (the original form) שׁוּר; (1 Samuel 18:6), a primitive root (rather identical with H7788 (שׁוּר) through the idea of strolling minstrelsy);
strongs_def: to sing
gloss: behold (by mistake for H7789 (שׁוּר)), sing(-er, -ing man, -ing woman).

derivation: apparent contracted from H226 (אוֹת) in the demonstrative sense of entity;
strongs_def: properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
gloss: (as such unrepresented in English).

strongs_def: a song; abstractly, singing
gloss: musical(-ick), [idiom] sing(-er, -ing), song.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

strongs_def: soil (from its general redness)
gloss: country, earth, ground, husband(-man) (-ry), land.

strongs_def: foreign, or (concretely) a foreigner, or (abstractly) heathendom
gloss: alien, strange ([phrase] -er).

verses.english: If I forget thee, O Jerusalem, let my right hand forget her cunning.

strongs_def: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
gloss: (and, can-, doubtless, if, that) (not), [phrase] but, either, [phrase] except, [phrase] more(-over if, than), neither, nevertheless, nor, oh that, or, [phrase] save (only, -ing), seeing, since, sith, [phrase] surely (no more, none, not), though, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] unless, [phrase] verily, when, whereas, whether, while, [phrase] yet.

strongs_def: to mislay, i.e. to be oblivious of, from want of memory or attention
gloss: [idiom] at all, (cause to) forget.

derivation: rarely יְרוּשָׁלַיִם; a dual (in allusion to its two main hills (the true pointing, at least of the former reading, seems to be that of H3390 (יְרוּשָׁלֵם))); probably from (the passive participle of) H3384 (יָרָה) and H7999 (שָׁלַם); founded peaceful;
strongs_def: Jerushalaim or Jerushalem, the capital city of Palestine
gloss: Jerusalem.

strongs_def: to mislay, i.e. to be oblivious of, from want of memory or attention
gloss: [idiom] at all, (cause to) forget.

strongs_def: the right hand or side (leg, eye) of a person or other object (as the stronger and more dexterous); locally, the south
gloss: [phrase] left-handed, right (hand, side), south.

verses.english: If I do not remember thee, let my tongue cleave to the roof of my mouth; if I prefer not Jerusalem above my chief joy.

strongs_def: properly, to impinge, i.e. cling or adhere; figuratively, to catch by pursuit
gloss: abide fast, cleave (fast together), follow close (hard after), be joined (together), keep (fast), overtake, pursue hard, stick, take.

derivation: or לָשֹׁן; also (in plural) feminine לְשֹׁנָה; from H3960 (לָשַׁן);
strongs_def: the tongue (of man or animals), used literally (as the instrument of licking, eating, or speech), and figuratively (speech, an ingot, a fork of flame, a cove of water)
gloss: [phrase] babbler, bay, [phrase] evil speaker, language, talker, tongue, wedge.

derivation: probably from H2596 (חָנַךְ) in the sense of tasting;
strongs_def: properly, the palate or inside of the mouth; hence, the mouth itself (as the organ of speech, taste and kissing)
gloss: (roof of the) mouth, taste.

strongs_def: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
gloss: (and, can-, doubtless, if, that) (not), [phrase] but, either, [phrase] except, [phrase] more(-over if, than), neither, nevertheless, nor, oh that, or, [phrase] save (only, -ing), seeing, since, sith, [phrase] surely (no more, none, not), though, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] unless, [phrase] verily, when, whereas, whether, while, [phrase] yet.

derivation: or לוֹא; or לֹה; (Deuteronomy 3:11), a primitive particle;
strongs_def: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
gloss: [idiom] before, [phrase] or else, ere, [phrase] except, ig(-norant), much, less, nay, neither, never, no((-ne), -r, (-thing)), ([idiom] as though...,(can-), for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of, [phrase] surely, [phrase] as truly as, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] verily, for want, [phrase] whether, without.

gloss: [idiom] burn (incense), [idiom] earnestly, be male, (make) mention (of), be mindful, recount, record(-er), remember, make to be remembered, bring (call, come, keep, put) to (in) remembrance, [idiom] still, think on, [idiom] well.

gloss: (and, can-, doubtless, if, that) (not), [phrase] but, either, [phrase] except, [phrase] more(-over if, than), neither, nevertheless, nor, oh that, or, [phrase] save (only, -ing), seeing, since, sith, [phrase] surely (no more, none, not), though, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] unless, [phrase] verily, when, whereas, whether, while, [phrase] yet.

strongs_def: to ascend, intransitively (be high) or actively (mount); used in a great variety of senses, primary and secondary, literal and figurative
gloss: arise (up), (cause to) ascend up, at once, break (the day) (up), bring (up), (cause to) burn, carry up, cast up, [phrase] shew, climb (up), (cause to, make to) come (up), cut off, dawn, depart, exalt, excel, fall, fetch up, get up, (make to) go (away, up); grow (over) increase, lay, leap, levy, lift (self) up, light, (make) up, [idiom] mention, mount up, offer, make to pay, [phrase] perfect, prefer, put (on), raise, recover, restore, (make to) rise (up), scale, set (up), shoot forth (up), (begin to) spring (up), stir up, take away (up), work.

gloss: (as such unrepresented in English).

strongs_def: Jerushalaim or Jerushalem, the capital city of Palestine
gloss: Jerusalem.

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);

gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

derivation: from an unused root apparently meaning to shake;
strongs_def: the head (as most easily shaken), whether literal or figurative (in many applications, of place, time, rank, itc.)
gloss: band, beginning, captain, chapiter, chief(-est place, man, things), company, end, [idiom] every (man), excellent, first, forefront, (be-)head, height, (on) high(-est part, (priest)), [idiom] lead, [idiom] poor, principal, ruler, sum, top.

strongs_def: blithesomeness or glee, (religious or festival)
gloss: [idiom] exceeding(-ly), gladness, joy(-fulness), mirth, pleasure, rejoice(-ing).

verses.english: Remember, O LORD, the children of Edom in the day of Jerusalem; who said, Rase it, rase it, even to the foundation thereof.

derivation: a primitive root; also as denominative from H2145 (זָכָר)
strongs_def: properly, to mark (so as to be recognized), i.e. to remember; by implication, to mention;  to be male
gloss: [idiom] burn (incense), [idiom] earnestly, be male, (make) mention (of), be mindful, recount, record(-er), remember, make to be remembered, bring (call, come, keep, put) to (in) remembrance, [idiom] still, think on, [idiom] well.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: a son (as a builder of the family name), in the widest sense (of literal and figurative relationship, including grandson, subject, nation, quality or condition, etc., (like father or brother), etc.)
gloss: [phrase] afflicted, age, (Ahoh-) (Ammon-) (Hachmon-) (Lev-) ite, (anoint-) ed one, appointed to, ([phrase]) arrow, (Assyr-) (Babylon-) (Egypt-) (Grec-) ian, one born, bough, branch, breed, [phrase] (young) bullock, [phrase] (young) calf, [idiom] came up in, child, colt, [idiom] common, [idiom] corn, daughter, [idiom] of first, [phrase] firstborn, foal, [phrase] very fruitful, [phrase] postage, [idiom] in, [phrase] kid, [phrase] lamb, ([phrase]) man, meet, [phrase] mighty, [phrase] nephew, old, ([phrase]) people, [phrase] rebel, [phrase] robber, [idiom] servant born, [idiom] soldier, son, [phrase] spark, [phrase] steward, [phrase] stranger, [idiom] surely, them of, [phrase] tumultuous one, [phrase] valiant(-est), whelp, worthy, young (one), youth.

derivation: or (fully) אֱדוֹם ; from H122 (אָדֹם); red (see Genesis 25:25);
strongs_def: Edom, the elder twin-brother of Jacob; hence the region (Idumaea) occupied by him
gloss: Edom, Edomites, Idumea.

derivation: apparent contracted from H226 (אוֹת) in the demonstrative sense of entity;
strongs_def: properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
gloss: (as such unrepresented in English).

derivation: from an unused root meaning to be hot;
strongs_def: a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)
gloss: age, [phrase] always, [phrase] chronicals, continually(-ance), daily, ((birth-), each, to) day, (now a, two) days (agone), [phrase] elder, [idiom] end, [phrase] evening, [phrase] (for) ever(-lasting, -more), [idiom] full, life, as (so) long as (... live), (even) now, [phrase] old, [phrase] outlived, [phrase] perpetually, presently, [phrase] remaineth, [idiom] required, season, [idiom] since, space, then, (process of) time, [phrase] as at other times, [phrase] in trouble, weather, (as) when, (a, the, within a) while (that), [idiom] whole ([phrase] age), (full) year(-ly), [phrase] younger.

derivation: rarely יְרוּשָׁלַיִם; a dual (in allusion to its two main hills (the true pointing, at least of the former reading, seems to be that of H3390 (יְרוּשָׁלֵם))); probably from (the passive participle of) H3384 (יָרָה) and H7999 (שָׁלַם); founded peaceful;
strongs_def: Jerushalaim or Jerushalem, the capital city of Palestine
gloss: Jerusalem.

strongs_def: to say (used with great latitude)
gloss: answer, appoint, avouch, bid, boast self, call, certify, challenge, charge, [phrase] (at the, give) command(-ment), commune, consider, declare, demand, [idiom] desire, determine, [idiom] expressly, [idiom] indeed, [idiom] intend, name, [idiom] plainly, promise, publish, report, require, say, speak (against, of), [idiom] still, [idiom] suppose, talk, tell, term, [idiom] that is, [idiom] think, use (speech), utter, [idiom] verily, [idiom] yet.

strongs_def: to be (causatively, make) bare; hence, to empty, pour out, demolish
gloss: leave destitute, discover, empty, make naked, pour (out), rase, spread self, uncover.

strongs_def: to be (causatively, make) bare; hence, to empty, pour out, demolish
gloss: leave destitute, discover, empty, make naked, pour (out), rase, spread self, uncover.

derivation: properly, the same as H5703 (עַד) (used as a preposition, adverb or conjunction; especially with a preposition);
strongs_def: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
gloss: against, and, as, at, before, by (that), even (to), for(-asmuch as), (hither-) to, [phrase] how long, into, as long (much) as, (so) that, till, toward, until, when, while, ([phrase] as) yet.

strongs_def: a foundation (literally or figuratively)
gloss: bottom, foundation, repairing

verses.english: O daughter of Babylon, who art to be destroyed; happy shall he be, that rewardeth thee as thou hast served us.

strongs_def: a daughter (used in the same wide sense as other terms of relationship, literally and figuratively)
gloss: apple (of the eye), branch, company, daughter, [idiom] first, [idiom] old, [phrase] owl, town, village.

strongs_def: Babel (i.e. Babylon), including Babylonia and the Babylonian empire
gloss: Babel, Babylon.

strongs_def: properly, to be burly, i.e. (figuratively) powerful (passively, impregnable); by implication, to ravage
gloss: dead, destroy(-er), oppress, robber, spoil(-er), [idiom] utterly, (lay) waste.

strongs_def: happiness; only in masculine plural construction as interjection, how happy!
gloss: blessed, happy.

strongs_def: to be safe (in mind, body or estate); figuratively, to be (causatively, make) completed; by implication, to be friendly; by extension, to reciprocate (in various applications)
gloss: make amends, (make an) end, finish, full, give again, make good, (re-) pay (again), (make) (to) (be at) peace(-able), that is perfect, perform, (make) prosper(-ous), recompense, render, requite, make restitution, restore, reward, [idiom] surely.

derivation: apparent contracted from H226 (אוֹת) in the demonstrative sense of entity;
strongs_def: properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
gloss: (as such unrepresented in English).

strongs_def: treatment, i.e. an act (of good or ill); by implication, service or requital
gloss: [phrase] as hast served, benefit, desert, deserving, that which he hath given, recompense, reward.

strongs_def: to treat a person (well or ill), i.e. benefit or requite; by implication (of toil), to ripen, i.e. (specifically) to wean
gloss: bestow on, deal bountifully, do (good), recompense, requite, reward, ripen, [phrase] serve, mean, yield.

verses.english: Happy shall he be, that taketh and dasheth thy little ones against the stones.

strongs_def: happiness; only in masculine plural construction as interjection, how happy!
gloss: blessed, happy.

strongs_def: to seize (often with the accessory idea of holding in possession)
gloss: [phrase] be affrighted, bar, (catch, lay, take) hold (back), come upon, fasten, handle, portion, (get, have or take) possess(-ion).

strongs_def: to dash to pieces, or scatter
gloss: be beaten in sunder, break (in pieces), broken, dash (in pieces), cause to be discharged, dispersed, be overspread, scatter.

derivation: apparent contracted from H226 (אוֹת) in the demonstrative sense of entity;
strongs_def: properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
gloss: (as such unrepresented in English).

strongs_def: a suckling
gloss: babe, (young) child, infant, little one.

derivation: (but only used in the shortened constructive form אֶל ); a primitive particle; properly, denoting motion towards, but occasionally used of a quiescent position, i.e.
strongs_def: near, with or among; often in general, to
gloss: about, according to, after, against, among, as for, at, because(-fore, -side), both...and, by, concerning, for, from, [idiom] hath, in(-to), near, (out) of, over, through, to(-ward), under, unto, upon, whether, with(-in).

derivation: from an unused root meaning to be lofty;
strongs_def: a craggy rock, literally or figuratively (a fortress)
gloss: (ragged) rock, stone(-ny), strong hold.
